author: Bellular News
description:
Click this link https://sponsr.is/bootdev_bellularnews and use my code BELLULARNEWS to get 25% off your first payment for boot.dev. Sponsored by Boot.Dev.

Helldivers 2 sold 926k on Xbox in 6 days vs PS5's 633k at launch. But with 500k+ players, technical debt is crippling the game. CEO Shams Jorjani promises fixes with "a bigger knife."

00:00 Numbers BIG
02:31 The Difference A Year Makes
04:09 Sony's Success On Xbox
06:32 An Underlying Problem
08:30 No Brakes On This Train
10:54 Success Is Its Own Problem
